- You have to find words with the letters shown. Letters can be used multiple times.
- The middle letter (the red one) must be used.
- Words must have at least 3 letters.
- Only verbs in "infinitiu" can be used (no conjugated verbs). Substantives and adjectives will only be accepted in male-female, plural is not admitted.
- Own names are not admitted. Only words that are contained in the Diccionari de la llengua catalana de lâ€™Institut dâ€™Estudis Catalans (DIEC) will be valid.

- 3-letter words give 1 point; 4-letter words give 2 points.\n- Words larger than 5 letters will be worth as many points as letters the word has.\n- Each game has at least one "tuti" which is a word that has all the letters. Each tuti gives 10 extra points.
